thread.title: UNSEEN: NTR-Lakshmi Pranathi Playing With Their Son Abhay Ram, Adorable Pics!
thread.title_full: UNSEEN: NTR-Lakshmi Pranathi Playing With Their Son Abhay Ram, Adorable Pics!

title: UNSEEN: NTR-Lakshmi Pranathi Playing With Their Son Abhay Ram, Adorable Pics!
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Updated: Monday, October 26, 2015, 10:34 [IST] 
The much awaited project in the combination of NTR - Koratala Siva has finally flagged off yesterday. The film was rumored to be titled as Janatha Garage , with a tagline 'Anni Rakala Repair Lu Cheyabadunu' (All types of repairs can be done). 
Koratala Siva was in fact supposed to work with NTR before Srimanthudu. But the project did not materialize and Siva moved on with Mahesh Babu's Srimanthudu while NTR became busy with Puri Jagannadh's Temper. 
Now, after scoring a huge blockbuster, Siva has got back to NTR with a powerful story and the duo is expected to come up with a smashing hit. 
NTR is currently busy shooting for Sukumar's Nannaku Prematho but has however put another film on track before finishing off one, which is surprising many. Nevertheless, Nandamuri fans were happy with their idol's move as he has finally increased the pace of his films. 
On the other hand, NTR fans also got to witness some adorable moments at the opening ceremony yesterday, as NTR attended the event along with his wife Lakshmi Pranathi and Son Abhay Ram . 
Check out some of the unseen and cute pictures of NTR and his wife playing with their son, in the slides below. UNSEEN: Jr NTR Playing With His Son Abhay Ram, Adorable! 1/7 Abhay Ram 
Abhay Ram, who recently turned one was the special attraction at the movie opening of Koratala Siva and NTR. UNSEEN: Jr NTR Playing With His Son Abhay Ram, Adorable! 2/7 Abhay-NTR 
Abhay Ram switched on the camera for the Muhurtam shot of the film, which is a very sweet moment to witness. UNSEEN: Jr NTR Playing With His Son Abhay Ram, Adorable! 3/7 NTR 
NTR attended the event in his Nannaku Prematho Look. He appeared cheerful playing with his son Abhay, throughout the event. UNSEEN: Jr NTR Playing With His Son Abhay Ram, Adorable! 4/7 Lakshmi Pranathi 
Lakshmi Pranathi, who rarely accompany NTR during his film events, graced the event and was seen admiring her son Abhay Ram. UNSEEN: Jr NTR Playing With His Son Abhay Ram, Adorable! 5/7 
TDP leader Errabelli spotted playing with Abhay Ram at the venue. UNSEEN: Jr NTR Playing With His Son Abhay Ram, Adorable! 6/7 
Don't you think this makes an adorable sight to witness? You might like
